ygData.subject: Re: NURF
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the extra ticks mean nothing in a group since you rarely get a dot to even do more then 3/4 damage before the patch since the creature was taken out
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the extra ticks mean nothing in a group since you rarely get a dot
to even do more then 3/4 damage before the patch since the creature was
taken out so quickly. Believe me you can have a lot of friends but you'll
find that there not on all the time. Friends help but it doesn't solve the
problem.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 11:39 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] NURF


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
>True. I am only level 15. But, i really never expect to take out reds.
>I know that the capability is there, but I don't use it most of the
>time. "what would you like your tombstone to say" seems a good
>indication that you should not mess with it. In a group sure, I'll take
>it on. My pet and my lifetap(sop in the future) will do as much or more
>damage then most characters. Not to metnion if you get a dot to stick
>for more then 18 seconds. I have a feeling that I will be requested for
>groups even more then now.
>
>I know, I know, I am only 15 wait 'till you get to 35, then its a whole
>different story. Of course, I expect to have a very broad base of
>friends that I can group with.
>
>On another note, does anyone know a trick for getting around the limit
>of 20 names on your friends list? Especially since it is local and thus
>all your characters are drawn from the same list.
>
>Darkmoon
>
>
>--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Well your Necromancer is only level 15 wait awhile
>> actually not even awhile
>> soon you won't be able to take out reds. The thing
>> is now my Wizard friend
>> can kite guards better then me even the blue cons
>> which is what we hunt
>> normally anyway when kiting.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>> <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>> Date: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 9:37 AM
>> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] NURF
>>
>>
>> >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> >
>> >I acutally like it as well.
>> >
>> >The reasoning behind that is that I almost
>> exclusively group. I rarely
>> >solo, and when I do, it does not involve kiting. So
>> the patch actually
>> >helps my style of play quite a bit. Since I also
>> have a pure warrior, I
>> >can see where the game is unbalanced that a necro
>> can take down red
>> >creatures with virtually no risk to themselves,
>> while my warrior
>> >struggles and occasionally dies from yellow.
>> >Of course, I was in the Karanas last night and was
>> the /ooc channel
>> >spammed by people bitching about losing their
>> kiting abilities.
>> >
>> >Darkmoon 15th circle nercomancer
>> >
>> >--- Fraal <mata_eq@...> wrote:
>> >> So no one had anything to say about the DOT nurf?
>> >> I thought I would see tons of email. Maybe
>> everyone
>> >> is playing since the servers were down for so
>> >> stinking long.
>> >>
>> >> Anyway I like the way they did the DOT nurf, I
>> >> usually finght in a group so it HELPED me cus DAM
>> >> was increased if they run less then 18 seconds.
>> :-)
>> >>
>> >> I guess we shall see if this nurfs Kiteing . . .
>> >>
>> >> -Fraal L19 Ogre Shaman
>> >> -Skel L22 Necro
>> >> -E'ci
>> >>
>> >> (I have a vested interest in DOT's)
>> >>
>> >> P.S. (L19 SHM spells are sweet!)
>> >>
>> >>
